A C D E F G I M N P Q R S 

A

ADDLISTENERS - Static variable in interface Protocols
When player is given the control back, server sends this to enable all the buttons

C

Card - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is for cards in the game.
Card(int) - Constructor for class Card
Default constructor with an integer value and string for file name
Client - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is dedicated to each client.
Client(String) - Constructor for class Client
This is the constructor for Client class that builds the GUI using JFrame
CLIENTID - Static variable in interface Protocols
When server sends the client ID to each player

D

DEFAULT_FILE_NAME - Static variable in interface Protocols
This is the file name of the default picture on cards
displayArea - Variable in class Server
 
draw(Component, Graphics) - Method in class Card
This method displays the card onto the screen

E

equals(Card) - Method in class Card
This method checks whether the 2 cards are same or not depending on the unique value that each card has

F

FILENAME - Static variable in interface Protocols
When a player clicks the button, server sends the filename of the card that contains the image
FORFEITGAME - Static variable in interface Protocols
When a player forfeits the game, server sends this to notify both the players

G

GAMEOVER - Static variable in interface Protocols
When server tells the player that game is over now
getFileName() - Method in class Card
This method returns the string which contains the file name of the icon
getIsShown() - Method in class Card
This method returns whether the card is shown or not
getValue() - Method in class Card
This method returns the value of the card

I

INSTRUCTIONS - Static variable in interface Protocols
When server wants to sends some instructions to both the clients

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Client
Main method that creates an instance of Client object and starts the processing
main(String[]) - Static method in class Server
Main method that calls the server to start running
MATCH - Static variable in interface Protocols
When 2 moves of a player match, the server send this as a part of instructions

N

NON_MATCH - Static variable in interface Protocols
When 2 moves of a player match, the server sends this as part of instructions

P

playSound(String) - Method in class Client
This method plays the sound
PORT - Static variable in interface Protocols
This is the port number through which server and client interacts to each other
Protocols - Interface in <Unnamed>
This interface will be used for the protocols to be used by clients and server.

Q

QUIT - Static variable in interface Protocols
When the current player quits the game, the server sends this to both the clients to end the game

R

REMOVELISTENERS - Static variable in interface Protocols
When server gives control to other player, it sends this to disable all the buttons
run() - Method in class ServerThread
Override method of threads class.

S

Server - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is dedicated for server.
Server() - Constructor for class Server
Constructor for the class that creates the frame where all the messages are displayed
ServerThread - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is dedicated to 2 players who want to play the cards memory game.
setShown(boolean) - Method in class Card
This method sets whether the card is shown or not
STARTGAME - Static variable in interface Protocols
When 2 clients connect to server, the server sends this so that game can be started
startRunning() - Method in class Client
This method will connect this client with a server and then start the game
startRunning() - Method in class Server
This method will start running the server, wait for 2 connections and then start the game once 2 connections are there.
